product_name: Shimano Click'R CT40 Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Shimano Click'R CT4o bike shoes feature a solid platform for cycling as well as a great walking design. Shoes are great for beginning bike commuters and those new to cycling with clipless pedals. Synthetic leather/nylon mesh uppers are ruggedly built for long wear; breathable mesh aids ventilation. Traditional lace-up closures for even tension. Built on a generous last for a roomy and more accommodating toe box. Reinforced toe helps protect the uppers from brush and toe-clip abrasion. EVA midsoles enhance pedaling efficiency and walking comfort; fiberglass reinforcement enhances rigidity, stability and support. Recessed cleat attachment points in the Shimano Click'R CT45 bike shoes make for easy walking. Rubber tread pattern delivers walking traction. Cleats not included on these Shimano Click'R CT45 bike shoes.
short_description: The Shimano Click'R CT4o bike shoes feature a solid platform for cycling as well as a great walking design. Shoes are great for beginning bike commuters and those new to cycling with clipless pedals.
